page.title: 05Bakewell Fair
page.content: Bakewell fair comes once a year in July. It stays for one week, during carnival week. The fair is held on Bakewell market place and takes up a lot of space. Many people come to the fair and parking becomes a bit of a problem. The travelling fair people stay in caravans on the Showground while the fair is in Bakewell. It takes them about a week to put up all the roundabouts and sideshows. Some of the rides include the Waltzer, the Skid, Big Wheel, Helter Skelter, Cyclone, and Haunted House. Among the sideshows are stalls selling Candy Floss and Toffee Apples, and many different games of skill and chance. It's great fun!
